definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: . bend, twist (NH esp. in deriv.; Targum in deriv.; Syr.9ql twist, in der. spec.; Ar. 9aqala bind camel's folded fore-shank and arm together);—

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: be bent out of shape, crooked, Pt. fig. [[מִשְׁפּט מְעֻקָּל]] Hb Hab 1:4 crooked justice.
